instruction: Provide an example of an ethical issue related to Artificial Intelligence technology.
output: One ethical issue related to Artificial Intelligence technology is privacy. AI systems rely on large amounts of data to train and operate, which can include personal information of individuals. This data can easily be used for unintended purposes, such as targeting ads or making biased decisions. It is important for companies to ensure that their AI systems are able to protect the privacy of individuals, as well as adhere to applicable laws and regulations.
